issues.description: The commented sample usage in Main.java within the template repository shows two-argument constructors for Seal, Pig, and Goat (e.g., Seal("Clarabelle", "marine")), but both the UML in the problem statement and the solution code define only a single‐parameter constructor (name) for each animal subclass. This discrepancy may mislead students about the correct constructor signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the commented sample usage in template Main.java to use single‐parameter constructors (e.g., Seal("Clarabelle"), Pig("Doodle"), Goat("Buttinsky")) so it aligns with the UML and solution design.
